Text: damn it, the pirate bay doesn't let you say the letters C-0-M after saying the word F-R-E-E, so when i type out the meaning of FCBD, it screwed up the title of this post. oh well. not my fault!
also hope to see scans of judge dredd classics from idw, the worlds collide tie-in (sonic vs. mega man) from archie, and the avatar offering, a mature readers title written by christos gage!
